short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the Enter key behavior on Google Search page. Enter = Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension fixes the issue where pressing "Enter" in Google Search sometimes creates a new line instead of submitting the query. It ensures that "Enter" always sends your search request, restoring the expected behavior.

Key Features:
- Ensures "Enter" always submits the search query.
- Works automatically after installation, with no setup required.
- Eliminates frustration and speeds up the search process.

Ideal for anyone who wants reliable, hassle-free Google searches!
